page.title: 06MOTOR INDUSTRY RESEARCH
page.content: { The Motor Industry Research {Association (M.I.R.A.)}is situated on the Watling Street (A5),near Nuneaton, Warwickshire.It is an{independent {organisation for research and {development}which operates on a Customer-Contractor basis.It comprises Laboratories and a Proving Ground manned by staff-making a major contribution to{Automotive Technology. The facilities,which are being constantly updated,cover a site of about 250 hectares.They include a vehicle handling circuit,a Hyge reverse impact simulator and new engine test facilities to help with energy and conservation. M.I.R.A.,governed by a Council representing its 200 worldwide members is funded partly by subscriptions but mainly income from contracts for research,testing and development.
